description: Try our easy to follow Meatloaf recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Meatloaf,Low saturated fat,Tree nut free,Low sugar,Beef,Potato,High protein,High fibre,Mince,Low fat,Peanut free
name: Meatloaf Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 4 cups baby leaf salad mix (to serve)

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 200Â°C. Grease and line a 10x20cm loaf pan with baking paper.
For basic mince mixture, combine beef mince, onion, carrot, garlic cloves and parsley in a bowl. Use in the following recipe or place into a freezer bag, seal, label and freeze for future use.

Combine mince mixture, 1 cup breadcrumbs, barbecue sauce and egg in a bowl. Transfer to loaf pan and smooth top. Combine remaining breadcrumbs, bacon and parmesan in a bowl. Sprinkle over top of meat loaf.

Line a baking tray with baking paper. Put potatoes onto tray. Spray with olive oil. Cook both meatloaf and potatoes for 45 minutes until meatloaf is cooked through. Stand meatloaf for 5 minutes before removing from pan and slicing. Serve with potatoes and green salad.
